Text: Reservation ConfirmationPST Thank you for choosing Crowne Plaza for your travel needs Your confirmation number is Please use this number to reference your reservation Guest Name LOVEPHILLIP Hotel CHICAGOALLERTON IL NORTH MICHIGAN AVE CHICAGO IL UNITED STATES Telephone Number Driving Directions FROM I E OR W APPROACHING DWTN CHICAGO EXIT OHIO ST EAST PROCEED BLKS EAST TO ST CLAIR TURN LEFT ON ST CLAIR HEADING NORTH TO HURON ST TURN LEFT HTL ON RIGHT SIDE OF STREET AT MICHIGAN AVE HURON ST FROM I I OR I FOLLOW I Arrival Date DEC Number of Nights Number of Rooms Room Type King Leisure Nonsmoking Rate Type Great Getaways Arrival Rate USD per night plus tax per room If you need to cancel your reservation please do so before PM on DEC or your credit card will be billed for a minimum of night Should you need to make any changes to your reservation please contact your nearest reservation office listed at basshotelstemplateresofficehtml To cancel your reservation please visit crowneplazatemplateselreshtml If you are interested in receiving periodic emails with promotional offers from Bass Hotels Resorts hotel brands please click here bassbassnewhtml Please Note Only the reservation as entered into and confirmed by our system will be honored Any written or printed confirmation that has been altered may be rejected by the hotel As exchange rates may fluctuate from the time a reservation is made until the actual stay the confirmed rate is guaranteed in the hotels base currency Rates may include VAT SVC in Europe South Africa Have a safe and pleasant trip
